messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Cat Boy Rollercoaster. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: As the captain, I claim that the AI is rogue and anything that is related to the AI such as borgs to be de-sync'd or shut down, blah blah.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: So, engine is boom boom. AI, just only rogue and dead. I'll be uh, doing things, blah blah. Better get on dat shuttle boi.
